name: Price Table
author: wpdiscover

sections.description:
Pricetable WP plugin displays your pricetable on any WordPress post & page. It’s created by using the latest CSS3 techniques .

I’m offering free support as I build this plugin up to version 1.0.
Please use WordPress support forum to ask any query regarding any issue.

  1. Front End – This is what the price table looks like .

  2. Back End – The easy-to-use price table builder .

Features Of Plugin

  • Turn On With A Click Of A Button
  • Responsive Design
  • Clean Retina
  • Build with Bootstrap
  • 2 Designs
  • About Page
  • Html5 supported
  • Works with any WordPress Theme
  • Css3 Animations
  • Background Image Supported
  • Unlimited color Scheme
  • Contact Info Display Option
  • Flexible and user-friendly setup
  • Clean and well documented
  • Translation Ready, i18n Support
  • Easy disable the section that you do not need
  • Cross Browser Support

Check Demos

  • Free Plugin – Live Demos

Translators

Please contribute to translate our plugin. Contact at wordpress.org support forum.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire coming-soon-countdown folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Go to Coming Soon Countdown menu to customize this plugin.
  4. Finally Enjoy it.

Need Support

Please use WordPress support forum to ask any query regarding any issue.
